Unfortunately, You didn't like her at all. "Hi Steve!!!!!!" says Kate as she pulls you into a hug with her sweaty, greasy body. You could barely breathe, but she let go of you just in time.

Regaining my breath, you asked what she needed help with. "Well, I wanted to get sexy lingerie for a "certain someone"." She winked at me, UGH! "I could get a pink bra to keep my big E cup breasts in." No, wait maybe lipstick would work and you can help me put it on" she says in a seductive tone. 12.title: The Mall in a plus size store

123.content:
Not wanting Kate to remove any of her clothing, you decide to try and sell her some lipstick. "How about I direct you to our selection of lipsticks and gloss. You can take a look over there and try out any you think you might like in one of our changing rooms."

"Oh, but aren't you going to help me shop?" She winks at you trying to flirt.

You contain a shudder and try to find an excuse to get some fresh air. "I think I might know just the color for you, but we keep the sample in the back because it's so special. I'll get that and set you up in the changing booth behind us."

"You are too sweet. I could just eat you up." She laughs, giving you a deep look into her fat mouth. Bits of meat and tortilla littered her teeth and tongue. You are hit with a blast of her breath but manage to hold your own. That doesn't stop a bit of spit from landing on your check though. "I'll see you in a few and then you can help me apply what I find." She turns away as you cringe and wipe her slime from your face.

You go off to find the most expensive lipstick. You hope that the either the price will discourage her and make her leave, or that she buys it because you got it for her and you demonstrate you excellent selling skills to the management. You find a small tube with an exuberate price tag and take it to the plus-size changing room. It was empty, maybe you can leave the lipstick here and get lost before Kate spots you. You move to drop the tube on the small table where she would easily see it and try to get out but you suddenly feel faint. You put you hand on the table to steady yourself as your entire body goes numb. You black out for a moment and come to prone on the hard floor. You rub your pounding head and try to regain your bearings. You were still in the changing room but the walls seemed farther away. Then you saw something that made your jaw drop. The lipstick you had just put on the table was colossal. You couldn't believe it but you seemed to have shrunk. Judging from the open lipstick tube, you had shrunk down to...
123.title: Lipstick for a Large Lady

choices: You refuse and she takes you to the manager.
You refuse and she punishes you instead.
1232.content:
Your mind was racing. As impossible as it seems, you had mysteriously shrunk to about an inch tall. As you tried to make sense of the situation, you heard the door open behind you. You looked back to see the now colossal Kate entering the booth. She closed the door and her eyes were immediately drawn to the tube of lipstick you got for her. She took a step towards you, the folds of her skin wobbling from her own weight. You could only look on as this lumbering mass of fat dominated your field of view. It didn't take long before she spotted you though. You were tiny but with being the only thing in her field of view other than the lipstick which wasn't much larger than you, you weren't hard to miss. Her eyes got big and she bend down, bringing her face right in front of you.

"Whhhhhaaaaaaaaaaaaaaat the hhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhheeeeeeeeeeelllll?" was all she could muster. As she spoke you were bathed in her breath, and she certainly hadn't taken a mint since you last saw her. Her breath smelled like shit before but now it was 100 times more intense. You began coughing as your lungs fought for fresh air. Unfortunately, Kate kept talking. "Steve, what happened to you? How did you get so small? Is this just what they do to the new guy?" You didn't have any answers for her, not that you could answer while choking on the foul air she was spouting on you. "Steve answer me. What's going on?" She asks in a frustrated tone. She waited for your response, giving you a chance to take in some cleaner air.

"I don't know what happened and can you please back off, your breath is absolutely vile." You quickly realize that that was not the best thing to say as a pissed expression appears on her giant face.

"How rude. Is that how they trained you to speak to a customer? You think that just cause you're my friend means I'm going to let that slide? I know the manager here and you might not know it, but you might not have gotten this job if not for me. I don't care how small and cute you are but if you don't provide me with satisfactory service, I'll have to make a complaint to her."

The situation was quickly spiraling out of control. Kate was acting so uppity and like it or not, and you didn't, you needed help. After the second wave of her bad breath passed, you tried to pacify her. "Sorry, I'm just a little freaked out. I didn't mean to snap at you."

"Oh all right, I'll forgive you," Kate winks. "If you put that lipstick on me like you promised."

You looked over at the lipstick. It was bigger than you, and so was Kate's mouth. "You're joking right?"

"No I'm not Steve," She says in a matter of fact tone. "Either you do your job or I take you to your manager and make a big stink out of this."

Whatever you decided to do it looked like you'd be dealing with a "big stink". Do you do what Kate wants or take your chances with the manager?

choices: "I'm giving you an extra special reward.  A blowjob!" ;)

12321.content:
You hadn't met the manager, you were actually surprised that you got the job without meeting her, but you had been warned not to cross her. You decided it was best to not get on the bad side of a bunch of giants. "All right, I'll help you put on the lipstick," you tell Kate trying to hide your chagrin.

"Great!" Kate grins showing off her dirty, yellow teeth. She repositions herself so that her face is at the edge of the table so you could apply the cosmetic. "Hop to it Steve, I'm ready."

You look back at the huge tube of lipstick. You wrap your arms around the end and begin dragging it towards Kate. It was doable, but not easy. You never considered lipstick to weigh much of anything but for your shrunken muscles, it was taking considerable effort and you weren't even lifting it off of the ground. You had a bit of ground to cover too and Kate was happy to let you do all of the work, even if it would have been a thousand times easier for her. The total distance was only about a foot, but at your size and with your load it was another story. You were almost to Kate when you had to stop and regain your breath.

"Getting sweaty?" Kate asked with questionable concern in her voice. "Here let me cool you off." With that, she pressed her lips together and blew on you like a cup of coffee. The force of her breath knocked you flat onto your ass. The air quickly became hotter, humid, and much smellier as her thick breath enveloped you. You don't know if she was toying with you or was actually trying to cool you off with a breeze but it did just the opposite. "OK back to work, you're on the clock."

You grumbled to yourself and cursed your luck as you got back up. You resumed dragging the lipstick as demanded and finally made it to Kate's lips a full minute later.

"Finally," Kate exclaims, "I've been ready for yo... hold on." She paused and contorted her face a bit. Her lips scrunched up and her cheeks puffed out a bit. Then a deep rumbling erupted from her mouth, blasting you with a belch. The low sound shook you and the acrid stench almost made you pass out. You fell to your knees and began retching. "Scuse me, just a bit of gas." She was diffidently toying with you, asserting her power over you and demonstrating that she doesn't care how you think she smells.

You slowly collected herself and pulled yourself onto the tube. The faster you did this, the faster you could get away from her mouth. You somehow managed to lift the massive lipstick up and balance it on your shoulder. Maybe you were just motivated better now. Kate puckered her lips and made a kissy sound. You shuttered and pressed the tube onto her chapped lips. Honestly, it wasn't as hard as you had feared. You slid the makeup across Kate's flesh, repositioning as you needed. In just a few minutes, you were done. "How's that?" You shout up at your tormentor.

She lifts herself up and looks in the mirror on the wall. Thrilled to finally have some distance from her nasty mouth, you flopped onto your back and took some deep, clean breaths. Kate pressed her lips together and made some faces to herself as she evaluated your work. Finally she announced, "I gotta hand it to you, this looks great. The color choice and application, I think you deserve a reward."

You hope that means she was going to get you some help. Unfortunately she had something else in mind. You sky was darkened again by her huge face and it was getting bigger. She closed her eyes and puckered up as her lips were on a collision course with you. You put your hands up in a feeble attempt to shield yourself as Kate's lips press into your body. She was rewarding your hard effort with a kiss. You shivered in revulsion as she mashed her dry lips into the table and consequently you. Then things got worse. Her wet tongue darted out and poked at your nether region. Her meaty tongue slopped over your body, coating you in stinky saliva. You had no choice but to endure her "reward" until she was satisfied. It didn't take too long but really, the fact that it happened at all meant it went on too long for you. A trail of spit draped from her tongue to your chest as she pulled away. When it snapped, it flew right into your face. Kate looked in the mirror again as you lay in her filth.

"Not only does this lipstick stay on well, but you taste incredible," Kate muses. That was one of the worst things she could have possibly said. She thought you tasted good and you knew all to well what Kate did with anything she thought was tasty. You looked at her colossal belly and nearly shat yourself in fear as you imagined being eaten by this behemoth. Kate continues talking, "In fact, this is going so well..."

"These aren't big enough for this secion, maybe one of the other employers made a mix-up" You thought to yourself. "I'd better put these back in the other section before an accident happens."

The immense pain filled your body as you let out a loud squeal of pain, tumbling forward as you suddenly started to feel dizzy.

I'll see how they'll fit" She happily squealed as she stretched the waistband, moving them down towards her hip as you'd clearly notice the underwear wouldn't even compete with one of her cheeks, let alone both of them. Kate was oblivious to Steve and just thought he was the "Shy and silent" type as she attempted to try the thong on.

info.brief_description: You manage to shrink around a very large girl, rather nasty girl named Kate! Good luck!
info.description:
Theres this girl named Kate. She's about 5'11 and well over 300 pounds. Your name is steve and one day you manage to shrink around her. Kate smells rather bad, being that large its hard for her to shower everywhere and she has been known to have rather bad gas at times. She loves to eat. Also in this story are Kates mother who is also rather large and her bipolar friend amanda who is very fat and tomboyish.

Rules:
No male giants
Keep the character unoticed at least for a while
No one sentence chapters
Have fun!
